name: Diary of a Stoner
description:
Play as a Stoner who has a knack getting himself into some crazy situations!



Explore the Mysterious Dimensions of the Stoner Universe

Adventure through the Stoner Universe, but beware, for your choices have consequences. Many different endings are possible, depending on the decisions that you make! You may acquire great powers for good or evil, depending on the path you choose.



Relax and have a good time!

There is no need to stress in this game! You will not be put in a situation where it is kill or be killed in combat, and you are fighting to escape... It's just a fun weed game! Nothing inside this game will haunt your dreams for years to come!



Duel using the powerful deck of Stoner Magic Cards!

Engage in duels with the creatures you meet along your journey! As you grow stronger, you will acquire new powers to help you on your adventure!
